body.p: In developing the December 2007 exposure draft, the Board decided to address the simplification of the process for determining the pre‑acquisition retained earnings of a subsidiary more generally through an amendment to IAS 27 (see paragraph 38A of IAS 27 and paragraphs BC66D–BC66J of the Basis for Conclusions on IAS 27).
